string.name: how_to_use_the_mouse
string.b: Tutorial: How to use the mouse

resources.string:
• To move the mouse, swipe

• To left-click the mouse, press the Volume Up button
	or tap the touchscreen

• To right-click the mouse, press the Volume Down button
Deletion is only supported for files in \'My Documents\' folder and on the Desktop
Renaming is only supported for files in \'My Documents\' folder and on the Desktop!
Change folder on the top menu (or download files from Internet Explorer)
Hold down the volume up button to draw
Draw a wallpaper in Paint, or change folder on the top menu
